ResearchProjectDef.label: brain wiring
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that induce or prevent blunt sensations like joy or pain.

rulesStrings.li: subject->brain implants
subject_story->wrote a paper about the masochist cults use of mindscrews to improve their morale
subject_story->implanted painstoppers in an assault squad. They eliminated a much larger force, but were all mortally wounded or killed
subject_story->had a joywire installed and, though happy after that, stumbled simply through life
subject_gerund->crafting brain implants

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialized limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.

rulesStrings.li: subject->specialized prosthetics
subject_story->interviewed the indentured farmers of a feudal world, before and after their field hand installations
subject_story->watched a pit fighter equipped with a power claw face off against a miner with two drill arms
subject_story->worked as a surgeon on the rim, replacing missing arms with everything from a woodhand to a power claw
subject_gerund->crafting specialized bionic arms

ResearchProjectDef.label: compact weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft compact, concealable bionic weapons which can be embedded in various body parts.

rulesStrings.li: subject->compact weaponry
subject_story->was employed as a detective and was saved more than once by the concealed knee spike
subject_story->spent a summer recovering from being slashed by an escaped slave's hand talon
subject_story->was working in security, scanning visitors to the hall, when the cyborg attempted to enter
subject_gerund->crafting compact bionic weapons

ResearchProjectDef.label: poison synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics that synthesize venom from internal chemical reactors for use in toxifying attacks.

rulesStrings.li: subject->venomous bionics
subject_story->worked on chemical reactors at small scales, which could be shrunk and stored internally
subject_story->studied the waste rats of a trash world and wrote a paper on the unique toxins in their bite
subject_story->learned to love sharp little cutting edges, which could kill with a mere nick
subject_gerund->crafting poisonous bionic weapons

ResearchProjectDef.label: artificial metabolism
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics that process food more safely or efficiently than a biological stomach.

rulesStrings.li: subject->artificial metabolism
subject_story->developed a hunger so all-consuming that the installation of an artificial stomach was the only solution
subject_story->did not tell the Queen about the installation of the sterilizing stomach, but continued as her food tester all the same
subject_story->developed a loathing for food. A nuclear stomach heavily reduced food consumption, though the radioactivity was a nuisance
subject_gerund->crafting digestion-related bionics
subject_gerund->crafting artificial guts

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural computation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that assist thought and learning by use of a direct, shallow brain-computer interface.

rulesStrings.li: subject->brain implants
subject->neural computation
subject_story->knew exactly how to take out the jailor, with an EMP attack that would brain shock their learning assistant, buying time to free the prisoners
subject_story->mandated the installation of learning assistants or neurocalculators through the entire faculty
subject_story->had a learning assistant installed. It proved to be a problem later, when captured by pirates, who halted any escape attempts with EMP attacks
subject_gerund->crafting brain implants

ResearchProjectDef.label: skin hardening
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionic implants which induce the toughening of natural skin, producing an armor-like effect.

rulesStrings.li: subject->subdermal implants
subject_story->researched the glands of the barkskin dryads and reasoned they could be adapted to humanity
subject_story->traveled among the stoneskin tamers of the dinoworld, studying the thick keratin plates that covered them
subject_story->worked with nanonmachine glands to thicken the human epidermis, at the expense of meeting traditional standards of beauty
subject_gerund->crafting subdermal armor implants

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing factors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics that enhance natural healing processes.

rulesStrings.li: subject->healing bionics
subject_story->studied the Imperial royalty, to see if they had blue blood. They did not, but it did coagulate implausibly quickly
subject_story->ensured that all the pit fighters had Healing Enhancers and appropriate xenogerms, so that they could fight more often
subject_story->studied the ancient corpses found in a cryptosleep shrine and harvested rapid healing devices from them
subject_gerund->crafting regeneration bionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh shaping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics which induce the reshaping of natural flesh, usually for the purposes of aesthetic enhancement or personal pleasure.

rulesStrings.li: subject->aesthetic surgery
subject_story->halted the population decline on the urbworld, by distributing free love enhancers and lavish drugs
subject_story->was hired as chief flesh-shaper for an aesthetics clinic, spending their days making shapely limbs
subject_story->gathered the glitterworld children around the campfire and told horror stories about getting their non-aesthetic noses back
subject_gerund->crafting aesthetic bionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: molecular analysis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics with molecular analyzers for assisting the immune system or analyzing food.

rulesStrings.li: subject->molecular analysis bionics
subject_story->explained to the chefs of the cooking school that they must never get aesthetic noses, lest their gastro-analyzers fail
subject_story->had an immunoenhancer installed and so was able to walk freely in the isolation colony
subject_story->lectured on the potential hardware conflicts between bionic parts and molecular analysis implants
subject_gerund->crafting molecular analysis bionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: circadian influence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that chemically manipulate the circadian rhythm, reducing or altering the need to sleep.

rulesStrings.li: subject->sleep reduction implant
subject_story->studied unihemispheric sleep patterns in cetaceans and proposed a new form of circadian half-cycler
subject_story->forced any applicants for city guard to receive a half-cycler, so they could stay at post indefinitely, if necessary
subject_story->studied bullfrogs and giraffes to ascertain what xenogerms would be necessary for a circadian assistance gland
subject_gerund->crafting sleep reduction implants
